title: The Morning Routine
description:
The newest stop-motion piece from Edfield Pictures : a collaboration between visual artists H. Blake Edwards and David Stanfield of Charlotte, NC.

Comprised of over 300 individual photos shot on a Nikon D-40
Edited on Final Cut Pro

Music: "Heartbreaker"

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
The newest stop-motion piece from Edfield Pictures : a collaboration between visual artists H. Blake Edwards and David Stanfield of Charlotte, NC.

Comprised of over 300 individual photos shot on a Nikon D-40
Edited on Final Cut Pro

Music: "Heartbreaker" by Metronomy

http://www.hblakeedwards.com
http://www.bristowdesign.com

Thank you for watching.
